title: Plain Sans Serif
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317110331im_/http:/typophile.com/files/font_6651.jpg)

Anyone any idea what this font is?  
I found some similar but the "M" is always different.

Best, J

Font: 

 Interstate 

Solved By: 

 [fvilanakis](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317110331/http:/typophile.com/user/176276 "View user profile.")
author: jochen11

comments.content: **[Interstate](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317110331/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Font-Bureau&ffam=Interstate%20-%20Regular&fid=3b9d52734e045e0c432e4c5ebbc35e02&fsize=60&text=OMAR%20SY&fit=1)** from Font Bureau looks like a perfect match

Indeed. Interstate it is!  
Thank you!
